History of the Question of Palestine Find out how the question of Palestine was brought before the United Nations shortly after the end of the Second World War. United Nations Palestinian Rights Committee Background and the Mandate of the UN Committee on the Exercise of the Inalienable Rights of the Palestinian People Two-State Solution Conference and New York Declaration High-level International Conference for the Peaceful Settlement of the Question of Palestine and the Implementation of the Two-State Solution International Court of Justice and the Question of Palestine The International Court of Justice (ICJ) has played a pivotal role in addressing the complex and contentious issues surrounding the question of Palestine throughout history. Find out more about the ICJ cases. Study on the Legality of the Israeli Occupation The Study on the legality of the Israeli occupation aims to contribute to a broader understanding of the complex legal frameworks surrounding the Israeli occupation and its implications. UN System and the Question of Palestine Find out what the UN Secretary-General, Security Council, General Assembly, UN funds, programmes and agencies do on the Question of Palestine.
